dcterms:creator: Daniel C. Castro
Jeremy Tan
Bernhard Kainz
Ender Konukoglu
Ben Glocker
dcterms:description: The MorphoMNIST dataset is produced by applying morphological transformations on the original MNIST handwritten digit dataset. The digits can be described by measurable shape attributes such as stroke thickness, stroke length, width, height, and slant of digit.
dcterms:title: MorphoMNIST

dcterms:creator: Mengyue Yang
Furui Liu
Zhitang Chen
Xinwei Shen
Jianye Hao
Jun Wang
dcterms:description: The Pendulum dataset consists of images of a causal system consisting of a light source, pendulum, and shadow. The light source and the pendulum angle determine the length and position of the shadow.
dcterms:title: Pendulum

dcterms:creator: Johann Brehmer
Pim De Haan
Phillip Lippe
Taco Cohen
dcterms:description: CausalCircuit is a complex 3D robotics dataset where a robot arm moves around to turn on red, green, or blue lights. The dataset is generated by a causal system involving the robot arm and the lights.
dcterms:title: CausalCircuit
